name: Proteus Project
summary: A PDSPRJ file is a project created by Proteus, a program used to design, layout, and test printed circuit boards (PCBs). It contains a PCB layout or schematic design, which includes wires, mounting holes, and device placement. PDSPRJ files also store project properties, such as the title, author, notes, and creation and modification dates of the project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
